title.rendered: Why SEO IS ACTUALLY ALL ABOUT CONTENT MARKETING

content.rendered:
What is SEO?

SEO stands for (Search Engine Optimization). It is basically the process of affecting the online visibility of a website or webpage in a web search engine’s unpaid results and getting traffic from the “free”, “organic”, “natural” or “earned” search results on search engines.

Generally, the earlier and more frequently a website appears in the search results list the more clicks it will get from the search engine’s users. It may target different kinds of searches, including image search and video search.

What is CONTENT MARKETING?

Content Marketing, on the other hand, is a marketing technique which involves creating pages on your site having content that the general audience will find interesting and get attracted with the objective of driving profitable customer action.

It may be blogs, posts, articles, guides, info graphics, videos and more. It helps in building a strong relationship with your target audience, by providing them with high quality content which is very relevant to them on a consistent basis.

LINK BETWEEN SEO & CONTENT MARKETING

There’s a slight confusion over SEO and Content Marketing.  People think that SEO and Content Marketing is the same. But it is not. And the primary reason for this confusion is that there’s a decent amount of overlap between the two. But instead SEO and Content Marketing both go hand in hand and have a mutual relationship.

Another way to look at this situation is to think like SEO makes demands while content marketing fulfils those demands. SEO demands content while Content marketing is content. You are not an SEO until you are also a content marketer and vice-versa.

Similarly your SEO campaign will fail until you integrate content marketing and vice-versa. SEO and Content Marketing should work together as just from these basic points it is visible that SEO and Content Marketing are separate concepts that go hand-in-hand. But despite their differences, they can’t function without each other.

Jetquins Travels is one of the best seo companies in patna which provides top SEO services in Patna. Do let us know if you might need any help regarding your SEO strategy. We will help you get the business organically.

DIGITAL MARKETING COMPANIES IN PATNA:

Digital Marketing Company in Patna can undoubtedly handle your marketing campaigns. They come up with the plans and strategies that help you get the best result. If you are not getting your desired result from your investment on content marketing, the Digital Marketing Company in Patna and Digital Marketing Agency in Patna here will surely help you to achieve your digital needs.

Digital Marketing Company in Patna is dedicated to the task of providing desired results to the customers. Some of the Digital Marketing Agency in Patna has even made it to the Business World Magazine’s list of 25 hottest start-ups.

Jetquins Travels undoubtedly features the best minds in the business and can definitely handle your marketing campaigns efficiently. So when you know you have so many top rated companies near you take advantage of it and make the maximum out of it.
